name: Diary of a Wimpy kid clicker game
name_original: Diary of a Wimpy kid clicker game
description:
Hi!

This is my brand new Diary of a Wimpy Kid game

You need to do the following things to play the game:

1.Go to:https://scratch.mit.edu/ (Or install Scratch desktop)

2.Create a new project.

3.Hit the "File" button

4.Press "Upload from computer"

5.Select this file

6.Hit "Open"

7.Press the green flag.

8.Enjoy!
